ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] [egbarts] Changing computers
ygData.msgSnippet: to keep your hotkeys just copy all the .opt files (this will also keep any gamma settings etc that you use. If you want ONLY your hotkeys just copy the
ygData.messageBody:
to keep your hotkeys just copy all the .opt files (this will also keep any
gamma settings etc that you use.

If you want ONLY your hotkeys just copy the <charname>.opt files (where
Charname is the name of one of your characters)

Hope this helps!
----- Original Message -----
From: "Papa Legba" <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000 9:00 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] [egbarts] Changing computers


> From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
>
> I have a cable modem, so the patching won't be too awful. My roomate
> started in November, and it wasn't too bad then. I was more concerned
> withg losing all my hot keys and such. Between my cleric and bard and I
> have almost the entire bank of socials and all 6 hot key banks filled
> now. It will be a pain to redo them all... Well I get the new toy
> today, so we'll see how it goes...
> --
> We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
> Matt DeBarger
